DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial demonstrate acceptable safety profile immunological non-inferiority FLU D-QIV vaccine manufacture investigational process ( FLU D-QIV Investigational Process [ IP ] ) compare FLU D-QIV manufacture current licensed process ( FLU D-QIV Licensed Process [ LP ] ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity GlaxoSmithKline ( GSK ) Biologicals ' Quadrivalent Influenza Candidate Vaccine ( GSK2321138A ) Manufactured Using New Process Adults Children
DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll 3 age cohort : Adults : 18-49 year , Children : 3-17 year 6-35 month age .
